LanguageData.JRWValdosaurus.label: Valdosaurus
LanguageData.JRWValdosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0498-1975 [VALDOSAURUS CANALICULATUS] CODENAME: WEALD >472
A small iguanodont ornithischian. Small and swift, they are a joy to watch skittering about in the wild. Their purple hide is decorated with small quills and is quite difficult to use in leather working.
LanguageData.JRWValdosaurus.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.JRWValdosaurus.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.JRWValdosaurus.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.JRWValdosaurus.tools.head.label: head
